sn12.39:1.2: “Yanca, bhikkhave, ceteti yanca pakappeti yanca anuseti, arammanametam hoti vinnanassa thitiya.
sn12.39:1.4: Tasmim patitthite vinnane virulhe namarupassa avakkanti hoti.
sn12.39:2.1: No ce, bhikkhave, ceteti no ce pakappeti, atha ce anuseti, arammanametam hoti vinnanassa thitiya.
sn12.39:2.3: Tasmim patitthite vinnane virulhe namarupassa avakkanti hoti.
sn12.39:3.1: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, no ceva ceteti no ca pakappeti no ca anuseti, arammanametam na hoti vinnanassa thitiya.
sn12.39:3.2: Arammane asati patittha vinnanassa na hoti.
sn12.39:3.3: Tadappatitthite vinnane avirulhe namarupassa avakkanti na hoti.
